title: Google\Cloud\PubSub\Topic
name: Topic
description: A named resource to which messages are sent by publishers.

examples.caption: You can also pass a fully-qualified topic name:

params.name: connection
params.description: A connection to the Google Cloud Platform service

params.name: projectId
params.description: The project Id

params.name: name
params.description: The topic name

params.name: encode
params.description: Whether messages should be base64 encoded.

params.name: info
params.description: A [Topic](https://cloud.google.com/pubsub/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.topics

params.name: info.ame
params.description: The name of the topic.

params.name: info.labels
params.description: Key value pairs used to organize your resources.

params.name: info.kmsKeyName
params.description: The resource name of the Cloud KMS CryptoKey to be used to protect access to messages published on this topic. The expected format is projects/my-project/locations/kr-location/keyRings/my-kr/cryptoKeys/my-key.

params.name: clientConfig
params.description: Configuration options for the PubSub client used to handle processing of batch items through the daemon. For valid options please see Google\Cloud\PubSub\PubSubClient::__construct(). Defaults to the options provided to the PubSub client associated with this instance.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options

params.name: options.labels
params.description: Key value pairs used to organize your resources.

params.name: options.kmsKeyName
params.description: The resource name of the Cloud KMS CryptoKey to be used to protect access to messages published on this topic. The expected format is projects/my-project/locations/kr-location/keyRings/my-kr/cryptoKeys/my-key.

params.name: options.messageStoragePolicy
params.description: Policy constraining the set of Google Cloud Platform regions where messages published to the topic may be stored. If not present, then no constraints are in effect.

params.name: options.messageStoragePolicy.allowedPersistenceRegions
params.description: A list of IDs of GCP regions where messages that are published to the topic may be persisted in storage. Messages published by publishers running in non-allowed GCP regions (or running outside of GCP altogether) will be routed for storage in one of the allowed regions. An empty list means that no regions are allowed, and is not a valid configuration.

params.name: options.schemaSettings.schema
params.description: The name of a schema that messages published should be validated against, or an instance of Google\Cloud\PubSub\Schema.

params.name: options.schemaSettings.encoding
params.description: The encoding of messages validated against schema. For allowed values, see constants defined on Google\Cloud\PubSub\V1\Encoding.

methods.name: update
methods.description:
Update the topic.

Note that the topic's name and kms key name are immutable properties and may not be modified.

examples.caption: Updating labels with an explicit update mask

params.name: topic
params.description: The Topic data.

params.name: topic.labels
params.description: Key value pairs used to organize your resources.

params.name: topic.messageStoragePolicy
params.description: Policy constraining the set of Google Cloud Platform regions where messages published to the topic may be stored. If not present, then no constraints are in effect.

params.name: topic.messageStoragePolicy.allowedPersistenceRegions
params.description: A list of IDs of GCP regions where messages that are published to the topic may be persisted in storage. Messages published by publishers running in non-allowed GCP regions (or running outside of GCP altogether) will be routed for storage in one of the allowed regions. An empty list means that no regions are allowed, and is not a valid configuration.

params.name: topic.schemaSettings.schema
params.description: The name of a schema that messages published should be validated against, or an instance of Google\Cloud\PubSub\Schema.

params.name: topic.schemaSettings.encoding
params.description: The encoding of messages validated against schema. For allowed values, see constants defined on Google\Cloud\PubSub\V1\Encoding.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.updateMask
params.description: A list of field paths to be modified. Nested key names should be dot-separated, e.g. messageStoragePolicy.allowedPersistenceRegions. Google Cloud PHP will attempt to infer this value on your behalf, however modification of map fields with arbitrary keys (such as labels or message storage policy) requires an explicit update mask.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options

methods.name: exists
methods.description:
Check if a topic exists.

Service errors will NOT bubble up from this method. It will always return a boolean value. If you want to check for errors, use Google\Cloud\PubSub\Topic::info().

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options

methods.name: info
methods.description:
Get topic information.

Currently this resource returns only the topic name, if the topic exists. It is mostly useful therefore for checking if a topic exists.

Since this method will throw an exception if the topic is not found, you may find that Topic::exists() is a better fit for a true/false check.

This method will use the previously cached result, if available. To force a refresh from the API, use Google\Cloud\PubSub\Topic::reload().

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options

methods.name: reload
methods.description:
Get topic information from the API.

Currently this resource returns only the topic name, if the topic exists. It is mostly useful therefore for checking if a topic exists.

Since this method will throw an exception if the topic is not found, you may find that Topic::exists() is a better fit for a true/false check.

This method will retrieve a new result from the API. To use a previously cached result, if one exists, use Google\Cloud\PubSub\Topic::info().

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options

methods.name: publish
methods.description:
Publish a new message to the topic.

$message must provide at least one of data and attributes members.

params.name: message
params.description: An instance of Google\Cloud\PubSub\Message, or an array in the correct Message Format.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options

methods.name: publishBatch
methods.description:
Publish multiple messages at once.

Note that if ordering keys are provided, all members of given messages set must provide the same ordering key. Multiple ordering keys in a single publish call is not supported.

params.name: messages
params.description: A list of messages. Each message must be in the correct Message Format, or be an instance of Google\Cloud\PubSub\Message.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options

methods.name: batchPublisher
methods.description: Push a message into a batch queue, to be processed at a later point.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.debugOutput
params.description: Whether or not to output debug information. Please note debug output currently only applies in CLI based applications. Defaults to false.

params.name: options.batchOptions
params.description: A set of options for a BatchJob. Google\Cloud\Core\Batch\BatchJob::__construct() for more details. Defaults to ['batchSize' => 1000, 'callPeriod' => 2.0, 'numWorkers' => 2].

params.name: options.clientConfig
params.description: Configuration options for the PubSub client used to handle processing of batch items. For valid options please see Google\Cloud\PubSub\PubSubClient::__construct(). Defaults to the options provided to the client associated with the current Topic instance.

params.name: options.batchRunner
params.description: A BatchRunner object. Mainly used for the tests to inject a mock. Defaults to a newly created BatchRunner.

params.name: options.identifier
params.description: An identifier for the batch job. Defaults to pubsub-topic-{topic-name}. Example: pubsub-topic-mytopic.

params.name: options.closureSerializer
params.description: An implementation responsible for serializing closures used in the $clientConfig. This is especially important when using the batch daemon. Defaults to Google\Cloud\Core\Batch\OpisClosureSerializer if the opis/closure library is installed.

params.name: name
params.description: The subscription name

params.name: options
params.description: Please see Google\Cloud\PubSub\Subscription::create() for configuration details.

methods.name: subscription
methods.description: This method will not run any API requests. You will receive a Subscription object that you can use to interact with the API.

params.name: name
params.description: The subscription name

methods.name: subscriptions
methods.description: Retrieve a list of active subscriptions to the current topic.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options

params.name: options.pageSize
params.description: Maximum number of subscriptions to return.

params.name: options.resultLimit
params.description: Limit the number of results returned in total. Defaults to 0 (return all results).

params.name: options.pageToken
params.description: A previously-returned page token used to resume the loading of results from a specific point.

methods.name: iam
methods.description: Manage the IAM policy for the current Topic.
